name: psychopath sponge
description:
Story:

You are a policeman who has been assigned a mission to discover the cause of the disappearances. Several reports have reported suspicious sounds and smells coming from the Krusty Krab Restaurant and all the employees in this restaurant have not been found. 

I do not  own any rights to Spongebob Squarpants and this is not an official Spongebob game. 

Controls

WASD  to move

Left Shift  to run 

Left Mouse Button to  shoot "you cant shoot sponge" 

Recommended to play in resolution 1920x1080
